This website presents all the code used for the paper _The retinue response of the honey bee: how many pheromones are involved?_ by Kocher, Wong, and Holman (2020).


# Un-blinding and cleaning the raw data
Click [here](clean_raw_data.html) to see the R code used to remove the blind codes from the raw data collection sheet, and to prepare the data for analysis.

# Running the pre-registered statistical analysis
Click [here](preregistered_analysis.html) to see statistical results and plots generated by following the statistical analysis plan from the pre-registration for this study, which can be read [here](https://osf.io/ncf9z/).

# Running the analyses presented in the paper
Click [here](statistics.html) to see the R code used to generate all statistical results and plots presented in the paper.
